channel.title: [tut]Simple server stuff[tut]
channel.description:
Okay i made this tutorial because i was tired of seeing things like "How do i make myself owner?!" on Server Help This tutorial deals with alot of the basic things people ask for help on and some of the most uncommenly known things to begginner coders. This is in NO specific order.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 1.1-How to create a server 2.1-Compiling your server 3.1-How to edit login messages(I.E Welcome To BlahScape Type ::starter for .....) 4.1-How To Make a Safe Zone 5.1-How to add objects to places you want them 6.1-How To Delete objects you dont want there (i.e Doors,Walls etc.) 7.1-How to PortFoward 8.1-How to use Hamachi 9.1-How to make yourself Owner 9.2-How to make an admin/mod on your server 10.1-How To DOwnload JDK _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]1.1-HOW TO CREATE A SERVER[/b] Okay really? use the search button on here it does help ALOT but.... http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html heres a link This tutorial will take you step by step through the process of starting a server. NOTE: if you dont want to port foward keep reading this tutorial for help with other solutions.
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [b]2.1-COMPILING YOUR SERVER[/b] okay so this is a common thing among newbies many problems with compiling and not doing it right. This is the code [b]I[/b] like to use however you do not have to:
[code] :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: :: :: All of the following code is (C) Copywrited 2006-2007, :: :: Grene Penguin Entertainment. :: :: :: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :menu cls title The Perfect Compiler version 1.7 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To Run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color if %c%==reset goto reset if %c%==Reset goto reset if %c%==RESET goto reset if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3) :c3 if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce) :c4 %javac% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause cls goto menu :c5 %javac% -cp . .\src\*.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :ce cls echo You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. pause cls goto menu :r cls title Runserver goto cj :r2 set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto r3 :r3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4) :r4 if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se) :r5 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :r6 set rjava= set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %rjava% pause cls goto menu :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. pause cls goto menu :er cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :e cls exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cj if exist "%pro%_06%jav%" (goto sj) else (goto cj2) :cj2 if exist "%pro%_07%jav%" (goto sj2) else (goto cj3) :cj3 if exist "%pro%_08%jav%" (goto sj3) else (goto cj4) :cj4 if exist "%pro%_09%jav%" (goto sj4) else (goto cj5) :cj5 if exist "%pro%_10%jav%" (goto sj5) else (goto cj6) :cj6 if exist "%pro2%%jav%" (goto sj6) else (goto cj7) :cj7 if exist "%pro%%jav%" (goto sj7) else (goto cj8) :cj8 if exist "%pro%_01%jav%" (goto sj8) else (goto cj9) :cj9 if exist "%pro%_02%jav%" (goto sj9) else (goto cj10) :cj10 if exist "%pro%_03%jav%" (goto sj10) else (goto cj11) :cj11 if exist "%pro%_04%jav%" (goto sj11) else (goto cj12) :cj12 if exist "%pro%_05%jav%" (goto sj12) else (goto je) :sj set java="%pro%_06%jav%" goto r2 :sj2 set java="%pro%_07%jav%" goto r2 :sj3 set java="%pro%_08%jav%" goto r2 :sj4 set java="%pro%_09%jav%" goto r2 :sj5 set java="%pro%_10%jav%" goto r2 :sj6 set java="%pro2%%jav%" goto r2 :sj7 set java="%pro%%jav%" goto r2 :sj8 set java="%pro%_01%jav%" goto r2 :sj9 set java="%pro%_02%jav%" goto r2 :sj10 set java="%pro%_03%jav%" goto r2 :sj11 set java="%pro%_04%jav%" goto r2 :sj12 set java="%pro%_05%jav%" goto r2 :je cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions echo link to download the newest JDK Update. pause cls goto menu :sl cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r5 :sl2 cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r6 :cl cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c5 :cl2 cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c4 :reset cls echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs... pause del "Compile Logs.txt" echo ----------Compiler Logs---------- >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto menu [/code]
This is "Mod Tahroks Perfect Compiler" very good and easy to use for your server or client.
[b]2.2-"I saved it in client.java but it doesnt show up when i turn my server on"[/b] Okay im going to say this once [b]YOU NEED TO COMPILE EVERYTIME YOU CHANGE SOMETHING IN YOUR SERVER![/B] ______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]3.1-HOW TO EDIT YOUR LOGIN MESSAGE (I.E Welcome To BlahScape Type ::starter for....)[/b]
Okay this is fairly simple to do all you have to do is:
1.Open Client.JAVA 2.Open a Search (Ctrl+F) 3.Search for "Welcome To BlahScape" and press find next (no qoutes) 4.It should have highlighted the message "Welcome to BlahScape..." 5.Now all you have to do is change it to whatever you want, most people only want to change the "BlahScape". 6.SAVE 7.COMPILE <----MOST IMPORTANT
It Should Have Worked If Not Go back and see what you did Wrong.
[b]3.2-Changing all the BlahScape's to MyServerNameSCape's[/b]
okay Very easy
1.Open Client.JAVA 2.Open a Search (Ctrl+F) 3.Search for "BlahScape" and press find next (no qoutes) 4.It should have highlighted "BlahScape" 5.Change that to whatever you want it to be 6.Keep pressing "Find Next" and changing them untill there are no more 7.SAVE 8.COMPILE <---MOST IMPORTANT
This should have changed them if not go back and see what you did wrong.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]4.1-HOW TO MAKE A SAFEZONE[/b]
Okay this is an understandable question to ask, especially for newbies, its not that easy. But it is easy to understand.
1.Open Client.JAVA 2.Search(Ctrl+F) for "public boolean nonWild()" No Qoutes 3.You should see something like this: [code] public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431) || (absX >= 2439 && absX <= 2448 && absY >= 4951 && absY <= 4960) || (absX >= 2447 && absX <= 2457 && absY >= 4933 && absY <= 4944) || (absX >= 2467 && absX <= 2480 && absY >= 4933 && absY <= 4945) || (absX >= 3241 && absX <= 3256 && absY >= 9362 && absY <= 9376) || (absX >= 3363 && absX <= 3373 && absY >= 3295 && absY <= 3324) || (absX >= 2758 && absX <= 2791 && absY >= 2972 && absY <= 2980) || (absX >= 2864 && absX <= 2934 && absY >= 9670 && absY <= 9735) || (absX >= 3534 && absX <= 3565 && absY >= 3536 && absY <= 3565) [/code]
If not you aren't in the right place. 4.Go to the MOST southwest corner of the place you want a safezone 5.Get Coordinates from either ::mypos or from the emote panel its next to "run" "walk" Note: you should see X:1234 Y:1234 6.Put those Coords in the first [(absX >= .... and absY >= ....] spots 7.Now go to the most northeast place 8.Get the Coordinates 9.Put those Coords in the second [(absX >= .... and absY >= ....] spots 10.SAVE 11.COMPILE <----- MOST IMPORTANT
This should, inturn, create a safezone where players are safe from attack
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]5.1-HOW TO ADD OBJECTS TO PLACES TO PLACES YOU WANT THEM[/b]
Fairly easy to do.
1.Open Client.JAva 2.Search(Ctrl+F) for "public void NewObjects()" or "makeGloabalobject" no qoutes NOTE: searching "makeGlobalobject" may require you to press "find next" more than once 3. You should see something like this [code] makeGlobalObject(2735, 4903, 2842, 3, 10); // wall makeGlobalObject(2731, 4903, 2842, 3, 10); // wall makeGlobalObject(2713, 4908, 2804, 4, 10); // wall makeGlobalObject(2709, 4903, 2842, 3, 10); // wall makeGlobalObject(2506, 3053, 2842, 4, 10); // wall makeGlobalObject(2506, 3051, 2842, 4, 10); // wall makeGlobalObject(2514, 3046, 4252, 4, 10); // wall makeGlobalObject(3243, 9363, 1032, 4, 10); // wall [/code]
If not try searching for it again. 4.Find the coords of the spot you want the object. 5."makeGlobalObject(2735<---this is your X Coordinate, 4903<---This is your Y coord, 2842<---Object Number, 3<---Direction Facing, 10<---This should always be 10 or whatever all the other ones are); // wall" 6.Now SAVE 7.COMPILE<---MOST IMPORTANT
This should have worked if not go back and see what you did wrong. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]6.1-How To Delete objects you dont want there (i.e Doors,Walls etc.)[/b]
Fairly easy to do
1.Open Client.JAva 2.Search(Ctrl+F) for "public void Deleteobjects()" 3. You should see something like this [code] public void Deleteobjects() {
deletethatobject(2509, 3041); // door deletethatobject(2511, 3039); // door deletethatobject(2514, 3042); // door deletethatobject(2516, 3040); // door deletethatobject(2514, 3040); // door deletethatobject(2511, 3041); // door [/code]
If not try seaching for it again or search "deletethatobject" no qoutes 4.Find the coords of the spot you want the object. 5."deletethatobject(2509<--Your X coord, 3041<---Your Y coord); // door<---Object your deleting" 6.Now SAVE 7.COMPILE<---MOST IMPORTANT
This should have worked if not go back and see what you did wrong. ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]7.1-How To Portforward[/b]
Okay this is fairly easy to do. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html This is another tutorial about creating a server but it has how to portforward in it.
Another Way to PortForward is through Utorrent http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383567.0.html
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]8.1-How To Use Hamachi[/b]
Okay Hamachi is another way to make your server public.
1.Downlad Hamachi http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/ 2.your going to install it and Press the power button to turn it on 3.Click "Network" and select "Create a new network" 4.Make a name and password, most make the pass 123. 5.The numbers next to the power button, i.e 5.195.160.215<--mine, are what the ip of your server is going to be.
This should work if not go back and find out what you did wrong ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]8.2-How to Join a Hamachi server[/b]
1.You need hamachi 2.Go to "Network" and select "join an existing network..." 3.type in name and pass 4.put the numbers that person has into the ip spot 5.LOgin!
This should work if not go back and find out what you did wrong ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]9.1-How To Make Yourself Owner[/b]
Okay this is EXTREMLY easy
1.Go to your CHARACTERS folder 2.Find your name and open it 3.Where it says "Rights=0" change the 0 to 3 4.Save
[b]9.2-How to make an admin/mod on your server[/b]
Okay this is EXTREMLY easy
1.Go to your CHARACTERS folder 2.Find the name of the person you want to promote and open it 3.Where it says "Rights=0" change the 0 to a 1,or 2 4.1 is for mod 2 is for admin 5.Save _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]10.1-Downloading JDK[/b]
Okay for some reason EVERYONE has trouble with this so.... http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,372873.0.html This tutorial shows you how to download jdk AND setup classpaths
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Okay so this took me awhile to make please refer anyone asking any of these questions to this tutorial
Please don't flame me only positive and constructive comments
Enjoy!

item.title: [tut]Simple server stuff[tut]
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:

Wrong section. We also have a tutorial that is similar to this.

item.title: [tut]Simple server stuff[tut]
item.dc:creator: @skaterb0y12 skaterb0y12
item.description:
@skaterb0y12 wrote:

Okay i made this tutorial because i was tired of seeing things like “How do i make myself owner?!” on Server Help This tutorial deals with alot of the basic things people ask for help on and some of the most uncommenly known things to begginner coders. This is in NO specific order.

1.1-How to create a server
2.1-Compiling your server
3.1-How to edit login messages(I.E Welcome To BlahScape Type ::starter for …)
4.1-How To Make a Safe Zone
5.1-How to add objects to places you want them
6.1-How To Delete objects you dont want there (i.e Doors,Walls etc.)
7.1-How to PortFoward
8.1-How to use Hamachi
9.1-How to make yourself Owner
9.2-How to make an admin/mod on your server
10.1-How To DOwnload JDK

1.1-HOW TO CREATE A SERVER
Okay really? use the search button on here it does help ALOT but… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html heres a link
This tutorial will take you step by step through the process of starting a server.
NOTE: if you dont want to port foward keep reading this tutorial for help with other solutions.

2.1-COMPILING YOUR SERVER
okay so this is a common thing among newbies many problems with compiling and not doing it right.
This is the code I like to use however you do not have to:

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::                                                        ::
:: All of the following code is (C) Copywrited 2006-2007, ::
::               Grene Penguin Entertainment.             ::
::                                                        ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0
set jac=\bin\javac.exe
set jav=\bin\java.exe
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title The Perfect Compiler version 1.7
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To Run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler.
echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option: 
if %c%==c goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==R goto r
if %c%==color goto color
if %c%==Color goto color
if %c%==COLOR goto color
if %c%==reset goto reset
if %c%==Reset goto reset
if %c%==RESET goto reset
if %c%==e goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option: 
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:c
cls
title Compiler
goto cjc
:c2
if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce)
:c4
%javac% -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%javac% -cp . .\src\*.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
move .\src\*.class .\classes\
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Runserver
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cjc
if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2)
:cjc2
if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3)
:cjc3
if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4)
:cjc4
if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5)
:cjc5
if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6)
:cjc6
if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7)
:cjc7
if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8)
:cjc8
if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9)
:cjc9
if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10)
:cjc10
if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11)
:cjc11
if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12)
:cjc12
if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je)
:sjc
set javac="%pro%_06%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc2
set javac="%pro%_07%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc3
set javac="%pro%_08%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc4
set javac="%pro%_09%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc5
set javac="%pro%_10%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc6
set javac="%pro2%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc7
set javac="%pro%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc8
set javac="%pro%_01%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc9
set javac="%pro%_02%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc10
set javac="%pro%_03%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc11
set javac="%pro%_04%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc12
set javac="%pro%_05%jac%"
goto c2
:cj
if exist "%pro%_06%jav%" (goto sj) else (goto cj2)
:cj2
if exist "%pro%_07%jav%" (goto sj2) else (goto cj3)
:cj3
if exist "%pro%_08%jav%" (goto sj3) else (goto cj4)
:cj4
if exist "%pro%_09%jav%" (goto sj4) else (goto cj5)
:cj5
if exist "%pro%_10%jav%" (goto sj5) else (goto cj6)
:cj6
if exist "%pro2%%jav%" (goto sj6) else (goto cj7)
:cj7
if exist "%pro%%jav%" (goto sj7) else (goto cj8)
:cj8
if exist "%pro%_01%jav%" (goto sj8) else (goto cj9)
:cj9
if exist "%pro%_02%jav%" (goto sj9) else (goto cj10)
:cj10
if exist "%pro%_03%jav%" (goto sj10) else (goto cj11)
:cj11

title Error

pause
cls
goto menu
:sl
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"

goto menu

This is “Mod Tahroks Perfect Compiler” very good and easy to use for your server or client.

2.2-“I saved it in client.java but it doesnt show up when i turn my server on”
Okay im going to say this once YOU NEED TO COMPILE EVERYTIME YOU CHANGE SOMETHING IN YOUR SERVER!

3.1-HOW TO EDIT YOUR LOGIN MESSAGE (I.E Welcome To BlahScape Type ::starter for…)

Okay this is fairly simple to do all you have to do is:

1.Open Client.JAVA
2.Open a Search (Ctrl+F)
3.Search for “Welcome To BlahScape” and press find next (no qoutes)
4.It should have highlighted the message “Welcome to BlahScape…”
5.Now all you have to do is change it to whatever you want, most people only want to change the “BlahScape”.
6.SAVE
7.COMPILE <----MOST IMPORTANT

It Should Have Worked If Not Go back and see what you did Wrong.

3.2-Changing all the BlahScape’s to MyServerNameSCape’s

okay Very easy

1.Open Client.JAVA
2.Open a Search (Ctrl+F)
3.Search for “BlahScape” and press find next (no qoutes)
4.It should have highlighted “BlahScape”
5.Change that to whatever you want it to be
6.Keep pressing “Find Next” and changing them untill there are no more
7.SAVE
8.COMPILE <—MOST IMPORTANT

This should have changed them if not go back and see what you did wrong.

4.1-HOW TO MAKE A SAFEZONE

Okay this is an understandable question to ask, especially for newbies, its not that easy. But it is easy to understand.

1.Open Client.JAVA
2.Search(Ctrl+F) for “public boolean nonWild()” No Qoutes
3.You should see something like this:

public boolean nonWild() {
        if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)
                || (absX >= 2439 && absX <= 2448 && absY >= 4951 && absY <= 4960)
                || (absX >= 2447 && absX <= 2457 && absY >= 4933 && absY <= 4944)
                || (absX >= 2467 && absX <= 2480 && absY >= 4933 && absY <= 4945)
                || (absX >= 3241 && absX <= 3256 && absY >= 9362 && absY <= 9376)
                || (absX >= 3363 && absX <= 3373 && absY >= 3295 && absY <= 3324)
                || (absX >= 2758 && absX <= 2791 && absY >= 2972 && absY <= 2980)
                || (absX >= 2864 && absX <= 2934 && absY >= 9670 && absY <= 9735)
                || (absX >= 3534 && absX <= 3565 && absY >= 3536 && absY <= 3565)

If not you aren’t in the right place.
4.Go to the MOST southwest corner of the place you want a safezone
5.Get Coordinates from either ::mypos or from the emote panel its next to “run” “walk”
Note: you should see X:1234 Y:1234
6.Put those Coords in the first [(absX >= … and absY >= …] spots
7.Now go to the most northeast place
8.Get the Coordinates
9.Put those Coords in the second [(absX >= … and absY >= …] spots
10.SAVE
11.COMPILE <----- MOST IMPORTANT

This should, inturn, create a safezone where players are safe from attack

5.1-HOW TO ADD OBJECTS TO PLACES TO PLACES YOU WANT THEM

Fairly easy to do.

1.Open Client.JAva
2.Search(Ctrl+F) for “public void NewObjects()” or “makeGloabalobject” no qoutes
NOTE: searching “makeGlobalobject” may require you to press “find next” more than once
3. You should see something like this

     makeGlobalObject(2735, 4903, 2842, 3, 10); // wall
     makeGlobalObject(2731, 4903, 2842, 3, 10); // wall
     makeGlobalObject(2713, 4908, 2804, 4, 10); // wall
     makeGlobalObject(2709, 4903, 2842, 3, 10); // wall
     makeGlobalObject(2506, 3053, 2842, 4, 10); // wall
     makeGlobalObject(2506, 3051, 2842, 4, 10); // wall
     makeGlobalObject(2514, 3046, 4252, 4, 10); // wall
     makeGlobalObject(3243, 9363, 1032, 4, 10); // wall

If not try searching for it again.
4.Find the coords of the spot you want the object.
5.“makeGlobalObject(2735<—this is your X Coordinate, 4903<—This is your Y coord, 2842<—Object Number, 3<—Direction Facing, 10<—This should always be 10 or whatever all the other ones are); // wall”
6.Now SAVE
7.COMPILE<—MOST IMPORTANT

This should have worked if not go back and see what you did wrong.

6.1-How To Delete objects you dont want there (i.e Doors,Walls etc.)

Fairly easy to do

1.Open Client.JAva
2.Search(Ctrl+F) for “public void Deleteobjects()”
3. You should see something like this

 public void Deleteobjects() {

        deletethatobject(2509, 3041); // door
        deletethatobject(2511, 3039); // door
        deletethatobject(2514, 3042); // door
        deletethatobject(2516, 3040); // door
        deletethatobject(2514, 3040); // door
        deletethatobject(2511, 3041); // door

If not try seaching for it again or search “deletethatobject” no qoutes
4.Find the coords of the spot you want the object.
5.“deletethatobject(2509<–Your X coord, 3041<—Your Y coord); // door<—Object your deleting”
6.Now SAVE
7.COMPILE<—MOST IMPORTANT

This should have worked if not go back and see what you did wrong.

8.1-How To Use Hamachi

Okay Hamachi is another way to make your server public.

1.Downlad Hamachi

Softonic

Hamachi

Create a safe private network between computers


2.your going to install it and Press the power button to turn it on
3.Click “Network” and select “Create a new network”
4.Make a name and password, most make the pass 123.
5.The numbers next to the power button, i.e 5.195.160.215<–mine, are what the ip of your server is going to be.

This should work if not go back and find out what you did wrong

8.2-How to Join a Hamachi server

1.You need hamachi
2.Go to “Network” and select “join an existing network…”
3.type in name and pass
4.put the numbers that person has into the ip spot
5.LOgin!

This should work if not go back and find out what you did wrong

9.1-How To Make Yourself Owner

Okay this is EXTREMLY easy

1.Go to your CHARACTERS folder
2.Find your name and open it
3.Where it says “Rights=0” change the 0 to 3
4.Save

9.2-How to make an admin/mod on your server

Okay this is EXTREMLY easy

1.Go to your CHARACTERS folder
2.Find the name of the person you want to promote and open it
3.Where it says “Rights=0” change the 0 to a 1,or 2
4.1 is for mod 2 is for admin
5.Save
